body_html:
How did you install TensorFlow?

conda install tensorflow
It looks like 0.10.0rc0 is the latest version in Anaconda.
I have also tried 0.11.0rc0 from pip, nothing's changed.

Official binaries (11rc0 and before) don't support CUDA 8.0, only CUDA 7.5

Interesting. The doc says "The GPU version works best with Cuda Toolkit 7.5 and cuDNN v5"

BTW Nvidia lists CUDA Toolkit 7.5 and below under "archived":
https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-toolkit-archive
And CUDA Toolkit 8.0 is the only version supported for Ubuntu 16.04, so I guess I don't have a workaround to downgrade CUDA.

body:
> How did you install TensorFlow?

`conda install tensorflow`
It looks like 0.10.0rc0 is the latest version in Anaconda.
I have also tried 0.11.0rc0 from `pip`, nothing's changed.

> Official binaries (11rc0 and before) don't support CUDA 8.0, only CUDA 7.5

Interesting. The doc says "The GPU version works best with Cuda Toolkit 7.5 and cuDNN v5"

BTW Nvidia lists CUDA Toolkit 7.5 and below under "archived":
https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda-toolkit-archive
And CUDA Toolkit 8.0 is the only version supported for Ubuntu 16.04, so I guess I don't have a workaround to downgrade CUDA.
